original_title: CNN's Segment on Slavery Got Blown Up by a Lefty MAGA Supporter  — The Donald
article_summary: CNN segment on slavery sparks debate among users, with some criticizing the focus on the topic while President Trump addresses other issues, and others questioning the media's bias. The discussion also touches on the persistence of slavery in modern society and the perceived unwillingness of the media to acknowledge their role in perpetuating it.</s>
